Articles.Content:
Hi !

Some friends have advised me of this wonderful game. So I've tried it but for now I'd like it to be a bit more realistic to make the game harder !

Thus, I looked to the Realism Overhaul addon. However, I had some problems when installing the Realism Overhaul plugin for KSP v1.0.2. Installation was done "by hand" by placing the files in the KSP/Game Data file.

My question is : **Which plugins are you using to make Realism Overhaul working properly on KSP 1.0.2 ?**

**Without using CKAN.**

I've downloaded the plugin Realism Overhaul v10.0 alongside with it's dependencies :

- The Advanced Jet Engine v2.2.0 for KSP 1.0.2
- CrossFeedEnabler v3.3 compiled for KSP 1.0 (which is the latest release I've seen)
- The Ferram Aerospace Research v0.15.3.1 (up to date version) compatible with KSP 1.0.3
- Kerbal Joint Reinforcement v3.1.4
- Module Manager 2.6.6
- Module RCSFX 4.1
- Real Fuels v10.2 for KSP 1.0.2, I assume ?
- Real Chute v1.3.2.3 for KSP 1.0.2
- Real Solar System v10.0.1
- Smoke Screen 2.6.3

Some previous versions of Module Manager (v2.6.1, v2.6.3, v2.6.5) were included in some plugins too.

PS: I'm running the KSP 1.0.2 on a windows 64bits. Realism Overhaul seems to stop the game when files are still loading.

I'm completely stuck with this so any help would be highly appreciated !

Thanks !

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-30T22:30:10Z" title="06/30/2015 10:30  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 30, 2015</time> by niubi**

Welcome to the forums, niubi!

I personally don't use Realism Overhaul myself, but I should probably point out to you that Realism Overhaul isn't really aimed at newcomers to the game. My recommendation is to start with fewer, simpler mods, and get a more substantial feel for the game before tackling RO.

If you do insist on getting RO to work, you should probably ask for help in the official thread, as the users there would be more knowledgeable about your issue:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99966-1-0-2-Realism-Overhaul-v10-0-2015-167](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99966-1-0-2-Realism-Overhaul-v10-0-2015-167)
